price: (32) And do not approach unlawful sexual intercourse.[741] Indeed, it is ever an immorality and is evil as a way.
arabic: وَلَا تَقۡرَبُواْ ٱلزِّنَىٰٓۖ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فَٰحِشَةٗ وَسَآءَ سَبِيلٗا
footnotes: [741]- i.e., avoid all situations that might possibly lead to it.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: walā taqrabū al-zinā innahu kāna fāḥishatan wasāa sabīlan
